scripts.build: cd .. && yarn --cwd excalidraw-app add vite cross-env typescript @types/node @testing-library/jest-dom @types/testing-library__jest-dom vitest --no-lockfile && cd excalidraw-app && SKIP_TYPECHECK=true NODE_ENV=production VITE_APP_GIT_SHA=$VERCEL_GIT_COMMIT_SHA VITE_APP_ENABLE_TRACKING=true vite build --skipTypeCheck
